availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Robertson (Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, overseer and farm laborer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Ann Matthews Robertson in Christian County, Kentucky, on November 18, 1848. Father of Mary Elizabeth Robertson and Nancy E. Robertson. Married to Charlotte Matthews Robertson in Christian County, Kentucky, on November 28, 1860. Father of William W. Robertson and Richard L. Robertson. Overseer in Christian County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Christian County in 1850. Farm laborer in Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 441B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film 001942963, p. 146.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Christian County Marriages, Film 007734826.
